revised_title: Eukaryotic Gene Regulation: Evolution and Development
tldr: This article discusses the evolution of gene regulation in eukaryotic cells. It explains how principles from prokaryotes apply to eukaryotes and how control elements could have been combined during evolution. The article also highlights the understanding of development in Drosophila, which can be described as a series of genetic switches.
